data.text: @NicolaConnor7 Hi Nicola. 💐 You are allowed to bring along one plant/bunch of flowers on board. You would need to confirm with your government website/embassy of the country you'll be travelling to, if the type of flowers you'll be bringing into the country would be accepted. Thanks, Sivu 🍁
